update.available: A new update is available. Will be automatically downloaded unless otherwise specified.
update.downloaded: The new update is now ready to install. Please relaunch PoE-Overlay.

app.web-language-tooltip: Determines which webpages and APIs will be used when retrieving account, character and/or stash data

clipboard.empty: Clipboard was empty. You may need to start PoE Overlay with privileged rights.
clipboard.error: An error occurred while parsing the item.
clipboard.parser-error: Item could not be parsed. Please make sure you have the correct language selected.

command.name: Commands
command.text-description:
The message to send when pressing the shortcut.

Placeholders (use without quotes):
'@me' = Your active character name (Note: only work when logged in)
'@last' = The character name of the last player that whispered you

errors.http:
Could not communicate with the GGG trade website.
Please make sure the website is reachable.
errors.rate:
Limit reached. Please try again later.
If this keeps happening please try lowering the fetched item count.

evaluate.name: Evaluate

prediction.error: An error occured during price prediction.

errors.http:
Could not communicate with poeprices.info
Please make sure the website is reachable.

prediction.language: poeprices.info only supports English as client language.

property.range-description: Percentage Increase/Decrease for Search Item's Current Values

evaluate.show-exchange-rate-tooltip: Exchange Rates are provided by poe.ninja
evaluate.show-price-prediction-tooltip: Price predictions are provided by poeprices.info
evaluate.stale: Filter has been changed. Fetching again ... - Now?
evaluate.stats-mod-icon-check-all-tooltip: Auto-select all stats that have a special mod icon (e.g. Influence, Delve, Incursion, Essence, etc...)
evaluate.stats-pp-cluster-jewels-tooltip: Post-process Cluster Jewels and set threshold ranges for 'Item Level'' and 'Add # Passive Skills'
evaluate.stats-unique-check-all-tooltip: Auto-select all stats of Unique items

tag.clipboard: Note has been copied to clipboard.
tag.note: Only items without an existing note can be fast tagged. Note has been copied instead.
tag.outside-stash: Only items inside the stash can be fast tagged. Note has been copied instead.

help.browser: Holding CTRL while clicking will open the link in the default browser.
help.browser-title: How do i open the search in my default browser?
help.bug-title: Found a Bug? Or have a Suggestion? Please create an issue on GitHub
help.donate-title: Love the project? Feel free to leave a donation. Thanks for your support!
help.dwm:
This is mostly caused by an disabled Aero / DWM. Therefore try enabling this windows feature.
As it's required to create transparent windows.
help.dwm-title: Why is my screen turning black/white after toggling any feature?
help.graph:
The bar indicates the distribution of the item value. It basically groups the values by value and counts them.
The highest bar is the Mode. Also named 'most common value'. Mean is the average. Median is the centered value of all values.
help.graph-title: What does the graph represent? What is mode/mean/median?
help.graph-url: Open 'How to read a Histogram Min Max Median Mean' by 'academy.datawrapper.de'
help.graphic:
This is mostly caused by incompatible graphic drivers for the current chromium version.
Please disable Hardware Acceleration inside the tray menu.
help.graphic-title: The graphics are blurry/ graphic bug?
help.name: Help
help.wiki-title: See the project wiki for further documentation

map.boss-rating-info:
5: High and consistent damage output that is difficult to avoid reliably; skipped by many players.

4: High and consistent damage output that can be avoided reasonably well but still very dangerous.

3: Occasionally high damage output that can be avoided reasonably well.

2: Moderate damage output that can be easily kited and/or reasonably mitigated by most builds.

1: Trivial for most builds.
map.layout-rating-info:
A: The map has a consistent layout that can be reliably fully cleared with no backtracking.

B: The map has an open layout with few obstacles, or has only short and well-connected side paths.

C: The map has an open layout with many obstacles, or has long side paths that require backtracking.
map.name: Map

accelerator.any: Press any key... ESC will set it to unbound.

misc.name: Misc
misc.parser-error: Clipboard could not be parsed. Please make sure you have cleared (ESC) the previous highlight.

panel-tooltips.drag-handle: Drag this handle to move this panel
panel-tooltips.unlock-to-move: Locked - Unlock to allow moving of this overlay panel

account.login-info: To login a new window will be opened, once logged at the PoE website you should close the window.
account.name: Account Name

settings.are-you-sure-reset: Are you sure you want to reset the '{{featureName}}' settings to their default values?
settings.auto-selected-desc: The active character is auto-selected based on the last active character according to the PoE API.
settings.character-league-mismatch: Selected character is not in the select league!
settings.focusable-description: Allows keyboard navigation of the overlay (TAB / ARROW KEYS [←→↑↓])
settings.private-league-info: Private leagues become selectable when logged in

trade-companion.ask-if-still-interested-message-descript:
The message that'll be sent to the trader when using the 'Ask if still interested' button (or shortcut)

Placeholders (use without the quotes):
'@item' = The item requested by the trader (e.g. 'Header Hunter' or '3 Exalted Orb')
'@price' = The price offered by the trader (e.g. '25 Chaos Orb')
trade-companion.ask-if-still-interested-message-reset-de: Reset the 'Ask if still interested Message' to the default message
trade-companion.active-notification-border-color-descrip: The Border Color for the currently active Trade Notifications (which'll accept shortcut inputs)

auto-collapse.newest-description: Collapse new trade messages; i.e. keeps the first/oldest trade message expanded.
auto-collapse.oldest-description: Collapse old trade messages; i.e. keeps the newest trade message expanded.

trade-companion.error-select-active-character: No active character selected in settings
trade-companion.hide-highlight-on-trade-description: Hide the stash grid item highlighting when clicking the trade button on an incoming trade notification
trade-companion.name: Trade Companion
trade-companion.reversed-notification-direction-descript: Reverse the notification direction to be upwards.
trade-companion.reversed-notification-h-alignment-descri: Reverse the horizontal alignment to be right-to-left.
trade-companion.show-and-highlight-item-description: Show the stash grid and highlight the item when clicking the invite button on an incoming trade notification

keybindings.activate-next-description: Keybind to activate the next Trade Notification
keybindings.activate-previous-description: Keybind to activate the previous Trade Notification
keybindings.ask-still-interested-description: Keybind to ask if the player (of the active Trade Notification) is still interested to trade
keybindings.collapse-description: Keybind to collapse the active Trade Notification
keybindings.dismiss-description: Keybind to dismiss the active Trade Notification
keybindings.invite-to-party-description: Keybind to invite the player (of the active Trade Notification) in your party
keybindings.join-hideout-description: Keybind to join the hideout of the player (of the active Trade Notification)
keybindings.kick-from-party-description: Keybind to kick the player (of the active Trade Notification) from your party
keybindings.leave-party-description: Keybind to leave the party (of the active Trade Notification)
keybindings.offer-trade-description: Keybind to trade the player (of the active Trade Notification)
keybindings.repeat-whisper-description: Keybind to repeat the sent whisper (of the active Trade Notification)
keybindings.whisper-description: Keybind to whisper the player (of the active Trade Notification)
keybindings.whois-description: Keybind to whois the player (of the active Trade Notification)

trade-option.shortcut-description: Keybinding to send this whisper message to the player (of the active Trade Notification)

highlight-mode-tooltips.allitems: Highlight all items of all sets all at once
highlight-mode-tooltips.setbyset: Highlight all items of a single set

highlight-order-tooltips.largetosmall: Highlight Large items first, then Small items
highlight-order-tooltips.shortestdistance: Higlight items based on the shortest distance (i.e. least mouse movements required)
highlight-order-tooltips.smalltolarge: Highlight Small items first, then Large items

item-set.fill-greedy-tooltip: Use lower level items to fill up a set

identified-item-usage-tooltips.alwaysuse: Only Identified items will be used as part of a Set, and Unidentified items will never be used
identified-item-usage-tooltips.canuse: Both Identified and Unidentified items will be used as part of a set
identified-item-usage-tooltips.neveruse: Identified items are never used as part of a Set, and Unidentified items will always be used

quality-item-usage-tooltips.alwaysuse: Only items with Quality will be used as part of a Set, and items without Quality will never be used
quality-item-usage-tooltips.canuse: Both items with and without Quality will be used as part of a set
quality-item-usage-tooltips.neveruse: Items with Quality are never used as part of a Set, and items without Quality will always be used

settings.recipe-item-group-bg-color-tooltip: The color used as background for this item set group on the (draggable) item set group overlay/bar
settings.large-icon-tooltip: This icon will be shown as a background icon in the total set count bubble

corrupted-item-usage-tooltips.alwaysuse: Only items that are Corrupted will be used as part of a set, and items that aren't Corrupted will never be used
corrupted-item-usage-tooltips.canuse: Both items that are and aren't Corrupted will be used as part of a set
corrupted-item-usage-tooltips.neveruse: Items that are Corrupted will never used as part of a set, and items that aren't Corrupted will always be used

settings.separate-quality-items-tooltip: Separate Quality Items into their own sets (allows you to gain 1 additional currency)
settings.show-on-overlay-tooltip: Show this item set group on the overlay/bar
settings.small-icon-tooltip: This icon will be shown as a small icon in corner of the total set count bubble

stash-tab-search-tooltips.index: A comma-separated list of stash tab indices to be searched
stash-tab-search-tooltips.prefix: A comma-separated list of stash tab name prefixes to be search
stash-tab-search-tooltips.regex: A single regular expression used to find the stash tabs to be searched
stash-tab-search-tooltips.suffix: A comma-separated list of stash tab name suffixes to be search
